cards.name: Bad Breath
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.

cards.name: Bedeviled
cards.description: Exhaust.

cards.name: Boon
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Block.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards). Gain [E] . (NL) Exhaust.

cards.name: Celestial Aegis
cards.description:
Reduce corruptthespire:Corruption by 1 (2).
Shuffle 2 Boons each into your draw and discard piles.
After playing all Boons, gain corruptthespire:Celestial Might.

cards.name: Contagion
cards.description:
Exhaust.
At the end of your turn, add a Contagion to your discard pile.

cards.name: Nudge
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 (2) Temporary_HP.
Scry 1 (2). Draw 1 card.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards) next turn.
Upgrade a random card in your hand. Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Shimmering Shield
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you play a card of a corruptthespire:different color, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies and gain 2 Block.

cards.name: The Fool
cards.description:
Choose one: Draw 3 (4) cards and draw 1 less card next turn, or draw 3 (4) cards next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.description:
Add 2 (3) random cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fated
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Remove this from your deck after winning 5 combats. (You need to win 5 more.)

cards.name: Annihilation Ray
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 20 (24) damage.
Gain 4 (5) Temporary_HP.
When this card is Exhausted, add a random corrupted card to your hand.

cards.name: Black Omen
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 3 (4) corruptthespire:Abysstouched to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Blasphemous Hymn
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.
Apply 1 corruptthespire:Abysstouched to ALL enemies for every 10 corruptthespire:Corruption.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Blaze from Beyond
cards.description: Deal 14 (18) damage plus 1 damage for every 10 corruptthespire:Corruption to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Condemn
cards.description:
Deal 13 (15) damage.
Enemy loses HP equal to 4 (6)% of their Max HP.
Gain 1 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Corrupted Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Gain 5 corruptthespire:Corruption.
At the end of your turn, deal 30% corruptthespire:Corruption damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Dark Lore
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Gain 2 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Death Touch
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage.
Apply 9 (12) corruptthespire:Abysstouched.

cards.name: Devil's Bargain
cards.description:
Put 3 (5) cards from your discard pile into your hand. Discard all other cards.
Gain 2 corruptthespire:Corruption.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Divine Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 1 (2) Mantra.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.description:
Deal 5 (6) damage.
Heal 5 (6) HP.
Gain 1 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Eldritch Fire
cards.description:
Lose X HP.
Deal 10 (13) damage to ALL enemies X times.
ALL enemies lose 2 (3) times X Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eldritch Insight
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random cards from your draw pile and put it into your hand, 2 (3) times.
Gain 1 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Essence Rip
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
corruptthespire:Corruption 50+: Twice.
corruptthespire:Corruption 100+: Three times.
corruptthespire:Corruption 200+: Four times.

cards.name: Fragmentize
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage.
If Fatal and your corruptthespire:Fragment of Corruption count is under 8, gain a corruptthespire:Fragment of Corruption.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Guiding Star
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus.
Gain 1 Orb slot. ( Choose one: Channel 1 Lightning, Frost, or Dark. )

cards.name: Hidden Potential
cards.description:
Gain 12 (14) Block.
Discard a card. If it was corrupted, a Status, or a Curse, draw 1 (2) card (cards) and gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Infernal Bargain
cards.description:
Now and each turn, choose one that hasn't already been chosen:
Gain 10 (13) Block.
Gain 2 (3) Strength.
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Take 20 damage at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Inner Flame
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Strength and 2 (3) Dexterity.
Gain 1 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Journey Beyond
cards.description:
Gain 2 Dexterity.
Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. ( It costs 1 less this combat.)

cards.name: Lightning Blood
cards.description:
Lose 1 HP.
Gain 3 Strength.
Gain 3 corruptthespire:Metallicize.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Lord of Nightmare
cards.description:
Whenever you draw a corrupted card, draw a card.
Whenever you play a corrupted card, gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Maniacal Rage
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Temporary_HP.
Gain Strength equal to the larger of your corruptthespire:common debuff stacks or the number of Status cards in your draw and discard.
corruptthespire:Corruption 150+: Gain 3 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Mask of Shards
cards.description:
Lose 2 HP.
Gain 15 (20) Block plus 1 Block for every 10 corruptthespire:Corruption.

cards.name: Night's Whisper
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak.
corruptthespire:Corruption:
30+: Enemy loses 1 Strength.
60+: Apply 1 Vulnerable.
90+: Double these debuffs.
120+: Triple these debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Profane Shield
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to
15 (20)% corruptthespire:Corruption.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Retribution
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
For each debuff on you ( and the enemy), deal 8 damage again.

cards.name: Shadow and Flame
cards.description:
Deal 10 (12) damage.
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable.
Apply 2 (3) corruptthespire:Abysstouched.
Gain 2 Frail.

cards.name: Unearth
cards.description:
Scry 2 (4).
Put a card of a corruptthespire:different color from your discard pile into your hand.
If you cannot, draw a card.

cards.name: Unnatural Order
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Poison gains all the benefits of corruptthespire:Abysstouched.
Convert all corruptthespire:Abysstouched to Poison.
When you apply Poison or corruptthespire:Abysstouched, apply 1 more.

cards.name: Void Armor
cards.description:
Gain 18 (23) Block.
Apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.
Add a Void into your discard pile.

cards.name: Wicked Ward
cards.description:
Gain 5 (7) Block.
corruptthespire:Corruption 60+: Gain 4 (5) additional Block.

relics.name: Abyssal Orb
relics.description: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Abysstouched to a random enemy. Whenever you apply Abysstouched, apply 1 additional Abysstouched.
relics.flavorText: It gazes back at you.

relics.name: Bag of Tricks
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 After Image. Draw 1 less card on the first turn of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Trick or treat!

relics.name: Bean Sprouts
relics.description:
Whenever you gain Frail or Vulnerable, or lose Dexterity due to an enemy, gain 1 Strength and 5 Block.
You gain this even if Turnip prevents the Frail.
relics.flavorText: They go well with everything.

relics.name: Black Card
relics.description: Shop prices are reduced by 30%. Whenever you enter a shop room, gain 2 Corruption.
relics.flavorText: For the truly elite, by invitation only.

relics.name: Blighted Spirefruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, reduce your Max HP by 4. Start each combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Infected with the Spireblight, but maybe eat it anyway?

relics.name: Bottled Prism
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card of a different color. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: The interaction of the bottle and the prism inside it creates fascinating rainbows.

relics.name: Bottomless Mead Horn
relics.description:
Based on the size of your deck:
20+: At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
30+: At the start of combat, Exhaust 1 Strike and 1 Defend in your draw pile.
40+: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: Drink the sea.

relics.name: Burning Ring
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card. At the end of combat, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Snake design. Maintains a flow of fresh blood.

relics.name: Chthonic Blessing
relics.description:
Gain 15 Gold after every non-Boss combat.
Gain a relic after every 7 non-Boss combats.
Future card rewards have 1 less card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The riches of the land, accumulated and hoarded.

relics.name: Corrupted Egg
relics.description: Cards in rewards have +33% chance to be upgraded. Gain 1 Corruption every time you gain an upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: Whatever life there once was here has been overtaken by corruption.

relics.name: Corrupted Toolbox
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random corrupted cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Everyone has a price.

relics.name: Deck of Many Fates
relics.description: Add a random card to your hand at the start of one of the first three turns of combat, chosen randomly. The card will be common if on turn one, uncommon if on turn two, and rare if on turn three.
relics.flavorText: The intricately drawn cards feel filled with omens and portents.

relics.name: Doom Sight
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, draw 1 card and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow.

relics.name: Doom Wing
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 2 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow.

relics.name: Fragment of Corruption
relics.description: Small fragment of corrupted Spirestone. Can be used at corrupted Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Both danger and power.

relics.name: Gnostic Blessing
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
At the start of each combat, gain 2 Metallicize.
Future card rewards have 1 less card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The pursuit of knowledge, relentless and deranged.

relics.name: Gohei
relics.description: Whenever you would receive 10 or more unblocked Attack damage, receive 5 less and add a Wound to your discard pile.
relics.flavorText: This tasseled rod cleanses and protects.

relics.name: Hand of Midas
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Elites drop 175 Gold instead of a relic.
relics.flavorText: Makes it hard to eat and drink.

relics.name: Harbinger's Claw
relics.description: Corruption increases your attack damage by the same percent that it increases enemy attack damage.
relics.flavorText: The claw of an otherworldly horror.

relics.name: Harbinger's Skull
relics.description: If you do not play any Powers during your turn, gain 3 Block at the end of your turn and draw 1 additional card at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The skull of an otherworldly horror.

relics.name: Heavy Sword
relics.description: At the start of your 4th turn, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It was too big to be called a sword. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough. Indeed, it was a heap of raw iron.

relics.name: Hideous Statue
relics.description: After every 3 combats, receive a corrupted potion reward.
relics.flavorText: A large stone statue of a creature you hope to never see.

relics.name: Mask of Nightmares
relics.description: Whenever you enter a corrupted room, raise your Max HP by 2.
relics.flavorText: Every glimpse is disturbing, in new way each time.

relics.name: Mystifying Timepiece
relics.description: If you do not play any cards that cost 0 during your turn, draw 1 additional card at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The time it keeps doesn't correspond to any system you know.

relics.name: Obsidian Shovel
relics.description: You can now gain corrupted relics at corrupted Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Made of a special material that absorbs corruption.

relics.name: Ominous Bracelet
relics.description: Reduce Corruption gained from entering rooms by 2. Corrupted events, treasures, and shops no longer give the lowest reward outcomes.
relics.flavorText: A ward that guides its bearer to greatness.

relics.name: Oozing Heart
relics.description: At the start of elite combats, heal 16 HP. Whenever you climb a floor, if you are above 1 HP, lose 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Slowly leaks, but beats rapidly when danger is near.

relics.name: Rusted Orichalcum
relics.description: At the start of your first 3 turns, gain 11 Block. At the start of combat, gain 3 Constricted.
relics.flavorText: But this metal is supposed to be indestructible....

relics.name: Shimmering Fan
relics.description: When you play cards of 3 different colors in a turn, gain 7 Block.
relics.flavorText: The fan responds to a mix of energies in air around it by defending its bearer.

relics.name: Slime Shield
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact, 1 Metallicize, and 1 Plated Armor, and shuffled 1 Slimed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Good defense, but very slippery.

relics.name: Transcendent Eye
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, Scry 1 and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The creature's eye still seeks out prey.

relics.name: Transcendent Pet
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, apply 1 Vulnerable and 4 Abysstouched to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly cute, in a grotesque sort of way.

relics.name: Unreliable Charm
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if the floor number is even, gain 1 Strength and 1 Buffer. If the floor number is odd, gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it works.

potions.name: Corrupted Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random corrupted cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Dark Elixir
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity. Gain 2 Corruption.

keywords.name: Abysstouched
keywords.description: Increases attack damage taken and deals damage every turn.

keywords.name: After Image
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain Block.

keywords.name: Celestial Might
keywords.description: At the beginning of your turn, gain 2 Temporary HP and deal damage to ALL enemies equal the floor number divided by 4.

keywords.name: Common Debuff
keywords.description: Weak, Frail, Vulnerable, negative Dexterity, negative Focus, Confused.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: Deals damage to you at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Corruption
keywords.description: Corruption, tracked in the upper right.

keywords.name: Different Color
keywords.description: Any color other than your character's normal card color.

keywords.name: Fragment of Corruption
keywords.description: Small fragment of corrupted Spirestone. Can be used at corrupted Rest Sites.

keywords.name: Hand of the Abyss
keywords.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply Abysstouched.

keywords.name: Lowest Reward Outcomes
keywords.description: Outcomes that only add Fragments of Corruption.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of you turn. Reduced by receiving unblocked attack damage.

mods.name: Corrupt the Spire
mods.description: Adds corrupted rooms to the Spire, which have increased rewards and new encounters, at the cost of increasing the corruption of the Spire and making all enemies more dangerous.
